title: Synthesis of high molecular weight poly(ricinoleic acid) via direct solution polycondensation in hydrophobic ionic liquids
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00185K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lulu Wang, Hua Yuan, Xiaoli Ma, Zijin Li, Haowei Sun, Xiaoyan Zhang, Xiaoyu Huang, Qiaohong Peng, Yeqiang Tan
Hydrophobic ionic liquids are excellent solvents for the solution polycondensation of methyl ricinoleate, and the derived high molecular weight bio-based poly(ricinoleic acid) has remarkable recyclability and sustainability.
